attributes.action: Educate UK Schoolchildren In Medical Care
attributes.additional_details:
Many children wouldn't know what to do if they saw someone collapse in the street. If they saw someone having a panic attack. If they saw someone choking. Most would just stand there, because they don't know how to help.

This is why I am petitioning to educate UK schoolchildren in medical care. Thank you for reading, I hope you sign the e-petition.
